Name: Dark Places
About the game: Dark Places is a psychological single-player game set in a surreal world filled with horrific creatures and nightmarish delusions. You play as a daemon hunter desperately searching for answers and slowly descends into madness. Key Features: • Terrifying and atmospheric environments • Original soundtrack comprises over 1 hour of haunting, melodic music • Challenging gameplay - face the unstable game engine limitations that will test your patience. • Puzzles - show your demons in the review section if you are not attentive to details and don't like to read notes that have tips for solving the puzzles • If you complete this game and write a positive review, then there is nothing impossible for you.
